articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: $70 and $80 game price tags send an early signal about Switch 2 game pricing - Ars Technica
articles.description: All Nintendo titles see an increase from the $60 Switch 1 status quo.

articles.author: Abner Li
articles.title: NotebookLM can now search the web and ‘Discover sources’ for you - 9to5Google
articles.description: To date, NotebookLM works by having you manually add files and links, with Google now introducing a “Discover sources” button that searches.
articles.content:
To date, NotebookLM works by having you manually add files and links, with Google now introducing a Discover sources button that searches the web for you.
